response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. This product is valued at $800,000 by you, and it offers a multitude of features designed to streamline processes and increase efficiency. Considering its high value and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that you receive the best possible value while allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss this exciting proposition with you.", "product_price": 950000}
